title: new launcher

embed.description: PRE-ALPHA CLIENT! It's not even in Alpha! The new LoL client. ►Updated LoL Store: https://youtu.be/46G8Xl1RB7U ►►Subscribe to Bring It In: http://bit.ly/Brofresco ● LIVESTREAM: http://www.twitch.tv/brofresco I stream EVERY SUNDAY at 5PM CET! STALK ME!

body:
hey guys, i dont know where i can make this thread but i was wondering who can give me a link for the new launcher of the league of legend.

Thank you

ps: this launcher i want.

replies.body:
The new Client isn't in Alpha anymore, it's reached the Open Beta phase. There isn't a direct download link for the new client/launcher, but you can always download it via the regular patcher (there's a popup and consistent square for Beta).

If you're having trouble accessing the regular client, let me know.
